benchmark_details.name: Z EST (ZeroShot learning from Task descriptions)
benchmark_details.overview: Z EST provides a benchmark dataset for systematically measuring how well models can generalize to many tasks in the zero-shot setting.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate how well models truly understand each task from natural language descriptions.

data.source: Crowdsourced via Mechanical Turk from various domains.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation is based on F1 score derived from overlapping models' and gold answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in performing tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Best model (T5-11B with multitask learning) achieves 12% overall on C@90.
